DAZ Script "Example Material Definition" Sample

Todo:
Concepts Covered
Description :

Below is the source for a script that builds the individual shader objects (DzRSLShader) used by the custom material class, DzShaderMaterial, to pass values to a given shader. Whether that be for a beauty pass shader, a simpler shader used for the shadow pass, a displacement shader used in several different passes, or some other purpose.

 
Concepts Covered :
  • DESCRIPTION NEEDED
 
Source : ./samples/shader swapping/scripts/support/DAZ/shaderDefinitions/surface/

00002 /**********************************************************************
00003     File: exampleDef.dsa

00010     license provided with the DAZ Script Documentation.
00011 
00012     The contents of this file may not be disclosed to third parties, 
00013     copied or duplicated in any form, in whole or in part, without the 
00014     prior written permission of DAZ Productions, except as explicitly
00015     allowed in the DAZ Script license.
00016 
00017     See http://www.daz3d.com to contact DAZ Productions or for more 
00018     information about DAZ Script.
00019 **********************************************************************/
00020 /*****************************
00021    Script globals
00022 *****************************
00023 "Material" - is a transient global variable provided by the interpreter,
00024 that references the current DzShaderMaterial, when this script is
00025 executed via DzShaderMaterial::setDefinitionFile().
00026 *********************************************************************/
00027 var oShader;
00028 
00029 /**********************************************************************/
00030 setBusyCursor();
00031 
00032 Material.setMaterialName( "Surface Example - RENDER TO RIB" );
00033 
00034 // Surface Shader : Beauty Pass
00035 oShader = new DzRSLShader;
00036 Material.addShader( oShader );
00037 oShader.setShaderType( DzRSLShader.Surface );
00038 oShader.setShaderFile( "null" );
00039 oShader.setDefinitionFile( "support/DAZ/shaderDefinitions/surface/exampleSurf.dsa" );
00040 oShader.setRenderTimeFile( "support/DAZ/rendertime/surface/dzExampleAttribs.dsa" );
00041 
00042 // Surface Shader : Shadow Pass
00043 //oShader = new DzRSLShader;
00044 //Material.addShader( oShader );
00045 //oShader.setShaderType( DzRSLShader.Surface );
00046 //oShader.setShaderFile( "dzdefaultshadow" );
00047 //oShader.setDefinitionFile( "support/DAZ/shaderDefinitions/surface/exampleShadowSurf.dsa" );
00048 //oShader.setRenderTimeFile( "support/DAZ/rendertime/surface/dzExampleShadowAttribs.dsa" );
00049 //oShader.setOnlyInShadowPass( true );
00050 
00051 // Displacement/Bump Shader
00052 //oShader = new DzRSLShader;
00053 //Material.addShader( oShader );
00054 //oShader.setShaderType( DzRSLShader.Displacement );
00055 //oShader.setShaderFile( "dzdisplace" );
00056 //oShader.setDefinitionFile( "support/DAZ/shaderDefinitions/displacement/exampleDisplace.dsa" );
00057 //oShader.setRenderTimeFile( "support/DAZ/rendertime/displacement/exampleDisplaceAttribs.dsa" );
00058 //oShader.setActiveInShadowPass( true );
00059 
00060 clearBusyCursor();
